message: I was very surprised by the suddenness of his passing today.  I will miss his vision, his energy, and uncompromising attitude about the things in which be believed.  I wish his family well during this season.
For the best, or less, Steve was one of those Man who improveded the world we live in with his vision. And for that we will be forever grateful…
My friend bought the Macintosh 512K back in 1986. The serial number was #6. We thought this little computer was going to change the world. Thank you Steve.
"Life is brief, and then you die, you know.   And we’ve all chosen to do this with our lives. So it better be damn good. It better be worth it." Steve Jobs
Here's a page I put up on my website remembering Steve: https://sites.google.com/a/frederick.com/example-site-/Home/stevejobs
Thanks craigshipp. Here's my own article: http://gamoedotnet.blogspot.com/2011/10/steve-jobs-fruit-of-his-labor.html
